001package zemeckis;
002
003import java.lang.reflect.Field;
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005import javax.annotation.Nullable;
006import org.jetbrains.annotations.TestOnly;
007
008/**
009 * Utility class for interacting with Zemeckis config settings in tests.
010 */
011@GwtIncompatible
012@TestOnly
013public final class ZemeckisTestUtil
014{
015  private ZemeckisTestUtil()
016  {
017  }
018
019  /**
020   * Interface to intercept log messages emitted by runtime.
021   */
022  public interface Logger
023  {
024    /**
025     * Log message and exception.
026     *
027     * @param message the message.
028     * @param throwable the exception or null.
029     */
030    void log( @Nonnull String message, @Nullable Throwable throwable );
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Reset the state of zemeckis config to either production or development state.
035   *
036   * @param productionMode true to set it to production mode configuration, false to set it to development mode config.
037   */
038  @SuppressWarnings( "ConstantConditions" )
039  public static void resetConfig( final boolean productionMode )
040  {
041    if ( ZemeckisConfig.isProductionMode() )
042    {
043      /*
044       * This should really never happen but if it does add assertion (so code stops in debugger) or
045       * failing that throw an exception.
046       */
047      assert !ZemeckisConfig.isProductionMode();
048      throw new IllegalStateException( "Unable to reset config as Zemeckis is in production mode" );
049    }
050
051    if ( productionMode )
052    {
053      disableNames();
054      disableUncaughtErrorHandlers();
055    }
056    else
057    {
058      enableNames();
059      enableUncaughtErrorHandlers();
060    }
061    purgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected();
062    resetState();
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Reset the state of Zemeckis.
067   * This occasionally needs to be invoked after changing configuration settings in tests.
068   */
069  private static void resetState()
070  {
071    setLogger( null );
072    Zemeckis.reset();
073    TemporalScheduler.reset();
074    UncaughtErrorHandlerSupport.reset();
075    VirtualProcessorUnitsHolder.reset();
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Specify logger to use to capture logging in tests
080   *
081   * @param logger the logger.
082   */
083  public static void setLogger( @Nullable final Logger logger )
084  {
085    /*
086     * This should really never happen but if it does add assertion (so code stops in debugger).
087     */
088    assert !ZemeckisConfig.isProductionMode();
089    if ( ZemeckisConfig.isDevelopmentMode() )
090    {
091      final ZemeckisLogger.ProxyLogger proxyLogger = (ZemeckisLogger.ProxyLogger) ZemeckisLogger.getLogger();
092      proxyLogger.setLogger( null == logger ? null : logger::log );
093    }
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Set `zemeckis.enable_names` setting to true.
098   */
099  public static void enableNames()
100  {
101    setEnableNames( true );
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Set `zemeckis.enable_names` setting to false.
106   */
107  public static void disableNames()
108  {
109    setEnableNames( false );
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * Configure the `zemeckis.enable_names` setting.
114   *
115   * @param value the setting.
116   */
117  private static void setEnableNames( final boolean value )
118  {
119    setConstant( "ENABLE_NAMES", value );
120  }
121
122  /**
123   * Set `zemeckis.purge_tasks_when_runaway_detected` setting to true.
124   */
125  public static void purgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected()
126  {
127    setPurgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected( true );
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Set `zemeckis.purge_tasks_when_runaway_detected` setting to false.
132   */
133  public static void noPurgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected()
134  {
135    setPurgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected( false );
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Configure the `zemeckis.purge_tasks_when_runaway_detected` setting.
140   *
141   * @param value the setting.
142   */
143  private static void setPurgeTasksWhenRunawayDetected( final boolean value )
144  {
145    setConstant( "PURGE_ON_RUNAWAY", value );
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Set `zemeckis.enable_uncaught_error_handlers` setting to true.
150   */
151  public static void enableUncaughtErrorHandlers()
152  {
153    setEnableUncaughtErrorHandlers( true );
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Set `zemeckis.enable_uncaught_error_handlers` setting to false.
158   */
159  public static void disableUncaughtErrorHandlers()
160  {
161    setEnableUncaughtErrorHandlers( false );
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Configure the `zemeckis.enable_uncaught_error_handlers` setting.
166   *
167   * @param value the setting.
168   */
169  private static void setEnableUncaughtErrorHandlers( final boolean value )
170  {
171    setConstant( "UNCAUGHT_ERROR_HANDLERS", value );
172  }
173
174  /**
175   * Set the specified field name on ZemeckisConfig.
176   */
177  private static void setConstant( @Nonnull final String fieldName, final boolean value )
178  {
179    if ( ZemeckisConfig.isDevelopmentMode() )
180    {
181      try
182      {
183        final Field field = ZemeckisConfig.class.getDeclaredField( fieldName );
184        field.setAccessible( true );
185        field.set( null, value );
186      }
187      catch ( final NoSuchFieldException | IllegalAccessException e )
188      {
189        throw new IllegalStateException( "Unable to change constant " + fieldName, e );
190      }
191    }
192    else
193    {
194      throw new AssertionError( "Unable to change constant " + fieldName + " as Zemeckis is in production mode" );
195    }
196  }
197}
